description: 20 prompts combining multiple systems: timer+physics+branch, overlap+cast+UI, multi-event patterns, pickup systems, enemy AI patterns, full game mechanic Blueprints.

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a health pickup. On overlap cast to Character. If cast succeeds add 25 to a Health variable, play a sound, and destroy the actor.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_HealthPickup
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 25.0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n4: PlaySoundAtLocation [Sound=PickupSound]
NODE n5: GetActorLocation
NODE n6: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n4.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n4.Location [Vector]
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a trap. On overlap enable physics on the overlapping actor, add downward impulse of 5000, wait 2 seconds, then destroy self.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TrapFloor
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: SetSimulatePhysics [Simulate=true]
NODE n3: AddImpulse [Impulse=(X=0,Y=0,Z=-5000)]
NODE n4: Delay [Duration=2.0]
NODE n5: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Target [Actor]
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Completed -> n5.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for an interactive door. On pressing Interact check distance to player. If less than 200 use FlipFlop. A path rotates door 90 degrees and prints Open. B path rotates back and prints Closed.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_InteractiveDoor
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_InputAction [ActionName="Interact"]
NODE n2: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n3: GetDistanceTo
NODE n4: LessThan [B=200.0]
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: FlipFlop
NODE n7: AddActorLocalRotation [DeltaRotation=(Pitch=0,Yaw=90,Roll=0)]
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Open"]
NODE n9: AddActorLocalRotation [DeltaRotation=(Pitch=0,Yaw=-90,Roll=0)]
NODE n10: PrintString [InString="Closed"]
EXEC n1.Pressed -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.A [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.A -> n7.Execute
EXEC n7.Then -> n8.Execute
EXEC n6.B -> n9.Execute
EXEC n9.Then -> n10.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that spawns enemies in waves. On BeginPlay set a looping timer every 5 seconds. Each tick increment a WaveCount variable, spawn BP_Enemy at actor location, and print the wave number. After 5 waves clear the timer.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_WaveSpawner
PARENT: Actor
VAR WaveCount: Int = 0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="SpawnWave", Time=5.0, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_Custom [EventName=SpawnWave]
NODE n4: VariableGet [VarName=WaveCount]
NODE n5: AddInt [B=1]
NODE n6: VariableSet [VarName=WaveCount]
NODE n7: GetActorLocation
NODE n8: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=BP_Enemy]
NODE n9: PrintString
NODE n10: GreaterThan [B=4]
NODE n11: Branch
NODE n12: ClearTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="SpawnWave"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.A [Int]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Value [Int]
EXEC n6.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.SpawnTransform [Transform]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n6.Value -> n9.InString [String]
EXEC n9.Then -> n11.Execute
DATA n6.Value -> n10.A [Int]
DATA n10.ReturnValue -> n11.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n11.True -> n12.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a checkpoint. On overlap cast to Character. If success, use DoOnce, save the actor location to a variable SavedLocation, play a sound, and print Checkpoint Saved.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Checkpoint
PARENT: Actor
VAR SavedLocation: Vector
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: DoOnce
NODE n4: GetActorLocation
NODE n5: VariableSet [VarName=SavedLocation]
NODE n6: PlaySoundAtLocation [Sound=CheckpointSound]
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Checkpoint Saved"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
EXEC n3.Completed -> n5.Execute
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Vector]
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n6.Location [Vector]
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a damage zone. On overlap start a looping timer every 1 second. Each tick subtract 10 from Health variable and print the health. On end overlap clear the timer.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_DamageZone
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100.0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="DealDamage", Time=1.0, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_ActorEndOverlap
NODE n4: ClearTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="DealDamage"]
NODE n5: Event_Custom [EventName=DealDamage]
NODE n6: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n7: SubtractFloat [B=10.0]
NODE n8: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n9: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n6.Value -> n7.A [Float]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Value [Float]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n8.Value -> n9.InString [String]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a collectible coin. On overlap cast to Character. If success, increment a CoinCount variable, play sound at location, print the count, and destroy self.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Coin
PARENT: Actor
VAR CoinCount: Int = 0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: VariableGet [VarName=CoinCount]
NODE n4: AddInt [B=1]
NODE n5: VariableSet [VarName=CoinCount]
NODE n6: GetActorLocation
NODE n7: PlaySoundAtLocation [Sound=CoinSound]
NODE n8: PrintString
NODE n9: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.Value -> n4.A [Int]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Value [Int]
EXEC n5.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Location [Vector]
EXEC n7.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n5.Value -> n8.InString [String]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a disappearing platform. On BeginPlay use a Sequence. First output makes it visible. Second output waits 3 seconds, hides it, waits 2 seconds, shows it again, looping with a timer.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_BlinkPlatform
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetActorHiddenInGame [NewHidden=false]
NODE n3: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="Blink", Time=5.0, Looping=true]
NODE n4: Event_Custom [EventName=Blink]
NODE n5: SetActorHiddenInGame [NewHidden=true]
NODE n6: Delay [Duration=2.0]
NODE n7: SetActorHiddenInGame [NewHidden=false]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Completed -> n7.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a simple enemy. On Tick get distance to player. If less than 500 print Alert and move toward player using Lerp. If more than 500 print Patrolling.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SimpleEnemy
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n3: GetDistanceTo
NODE n4: LessThan [B=500.0]
NODE n5: Branch
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Alert"]
NODE n7: GetActorLocation
NODE n8: Lerp [Alpha=0.02]
NODE n9: SetActorLocation
NODE n10: PrintString [InString="Patrolling"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.A [Float]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n5.True -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.A [Vector]
DATA n8.ReturnValue -> n9.NewLocation [Vector]
EXEC n5.False -> n10.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a speed power-up. On overlap cast to Character. If success, set variable SpeedBoost to true, wait 5 seconds, set SpeedBoost to false, print Boost Expired, and destroy self.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_SpeedBoost
PARENT: Actor
VAR SpeedBoost: Bool = false
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: CastToCharacter
NODE n3: VariableSet [VarName=SpeedBoost]
NODE n4: Delay [Duration=5.0]
NODE n5: VariableSet [VarName=SpeedBoost]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Boost Expired"]
NODE n7: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute
DATA true -> n3.Value [Bool]
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Completed -> n5.Execute
DATA false -> n5.Value [Bool]
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint with integer PickupType. On overlap switch on PickupType. Case 1 adds 25 health. Case 2 adds 50 health. Case 3 adds 10 to armor. All cases play a sound and destroy self.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_MultiPickup
PARENT: Actor
VAR PickupType: Int = 1
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=PickupType]
NODE n3: SwitchOnInt
NODE n4: PrintString [InString="Health +25"]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Health +50"]
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Armor +10"]
NODE n7: GetActorLocation
NODE n8: PlaySoundAtLocation [Sound=PickupSound]
NODE n9: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.Selection [Int]
EXEC n3.Case_1 -> n4.Execute
EXEC n3.Case_2 -> n5.Execute
EXEC n3.Case_3 -> n6.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n8.Execute
EXEC n5.Then -> n8.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Location [Vector]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a turret. On BeginPlay set a looping timer every 2 seconds. Each tick get distance to player. If less than 1000, spawn BP_Projectile at actor location and print Firing.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Turret
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="TurretTick", Time=2.0, Looping=true]
NODE n3: Event_Custom [EventName=TurretTick]
NODE n4: GetPlayerPawn
NODE n5: GetDistanceTo
NODE n6: LessThan [B=1000.0]
NODE n7: Branch
NODE n8: GetActorLocation
NODE n9: SpawnActorFromClass [ActorClass=BP_Projectile]
NODE n10: PrintString [InString="Firing"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n3.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.OtherActor [Actor]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n7.True -> n9.Execute
DATA n8.ReturnValue -> n9.SpawnTransform [Transform]
EXEC n9.Then -> n10.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay creates WBP_HealthBar and adds to viewport. On AnyDamage subtract damage from Health variable. If Health less than 0 remove widget and destroy actor.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_HealthHUD
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100.0
VAR HealthBar: Widget = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: CreateWidget [WidgetClass=WBP_HealthBar]
NODE n3: AddToViewport
NODE n4: VariableSet [VarName=HealthBar]
NODE n5: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n6: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n7: SubtractFloat
NODE n8: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n9: LessThan [B=0.0]
NODE n10: Branch
NODE n11: VariableGet [VarName=HealthBar]
NODE n12: RemoveFromParent
NODE n13: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Target [Widget]
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Widget]
EXEC n5.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n6.Value -> n7.A [Float]
DATA n5.Damage -> n7.B [Float]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Value [Float]
EXEC n8.Then -> n10.Execute
DATA n8.Value -> n9.A [Float]
DATA n9.ReturnValue -> n10.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n10.True -> n12.Execute
DATA n11.Value -> n12.Target [Widget]
EXEC n12.Then -> n13.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a projectile. On BeginPlay enable physics, add forward impulse of 3000, set a 5-second self-destruct timer. On Hit print Impact and destroy self.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Projectile
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetSimulatePhysics [Simulate=true]
NODE n3: GetActorForwardVector
NODE n4: MultiplyFloat [B=3000.0]
NODE n5: AddImpulse
NODE n6: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="SelfDestruct", Time=5.0, Looping=false]
NODE n7: Event_Custom [EventName=SelfDestruct]
NODE n8: DestroyActor
NODE n9: Event_Hit
NODE n10: PrintString [InString="Impact"]
NODE n11: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n5.Execute
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.A [Vector]
DATA n4.ReturnValue -> n5.Impulse [Vector]
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
EXEC n7.Then -> n8.Execute
EXEC n9.Then -> n10.Execute
EXEC n10.Then -> n11.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a pressure plate. On overlap open a Gate. The gate exit activates a looping timer that prints Active every 1 second. On end overlap close the gate and clear the timer.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_PressurePlate
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: Gate
NODE n3: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="Activate", Time=1.0, Looping=true]
NODE n4: Event_Custom [EventName=Activate]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Active"]
NODE n6: Event_ActorEndOverlap
NODE n7: ClearTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="Activate"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Open
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n2.Enter
EXEC n2.Exit -> n5.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n2.Close
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint with vector SpawnPoint. On BeginPlay save actor location to SpawnPoint. When Health reaches 0, reset Health to 100, teleport to SpawnPoint, and print Respawned.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_Respawn
PARENT: Actor
VAR Health: Float = 100.0
VAR SpawnPoint: Vector
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: VariableSet [VarName=SpawnPoint]
NODE n4: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n5: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n6: SubtractFloat
NODE n7: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n8: LessThan [B=1.0]
NODE n9: Branch
NODE n10: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n11: VariableGet [VarName=SpawnPoint]
NODE n12: SetActorLocation
NODE n13: PrintString [InString="Respawned"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Value [Vector]
EXEC n4.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n5.Value -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n4.Damage -> n6.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Value [Float]
EXEC n7.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n7.Value -> n8.A [Float]
DATA n8.ReturnValue -> n9.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n9.True -> n10.Execute
DATA 100.0 -> n10.Value [Float]
EXEC n10.Then -> n12.Execute
DATA n11.Value -> n12.NewLocation [Vector]
EXEC n12.Then -> n13.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint for a platform that moves between two points. Use a float variable Alpha going from 0 to 1 on Tick. Lerp between PointA and PointB using Alpha. When Alpha reaches 1, reverse direction.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_MovingPlatform
PARENT: Actor
VAR PointA: Vector
VAR PointB: Vector
VAR Alpha: Float = 0.0
VAR Direction: Float = 1.0
VAR Speed: Float = 0.5
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_Tick
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=Alpha]
NODE n3: VariableGet [VarName=Direction]
NODE n4: VariableGet [VarName=Speed]
NODE n5: MultiplyFloat
NODE n6: AddFloat
NODE n7: VariableSet [VarName=Alpha]
NODE n8: VariableGet [VarName=PointA]
NODE n9: VariableGet [VarName=PointB]
NODE n10: Lerp
NODE n11: SetActorLocation
EXEC n1.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n1.DeltaSeconds -> n5.A [Float]
DATA n4.Value -> n5.B [Float]
DATA n3.Value -> n5.B [Float]
DATA n2.Value -> n6.A [Float]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [Float]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Value [Float]
EXEC n7.Then -> n11.Execute
DATA n8.Value -> n10.A [Vector]
DATA n9.Value -> n10.B [Vector]
DATA n7.Value -> n10.Alpha [Float]
DATA n10.ReturnValue -> n11.NewLocation [Vector]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that requires 3 overlaps in sequence. Use integer StepCount starting at 0. Each overlap increments StepCount. When StepCount equals 3, print Sequence Complete and play a sound.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TriggerSequence
PARENT: Actor
VAR StepCount: Int = 0
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=StepCount]
NODE n3: AddInt [B=1]
NODE n4: VariableSet [VarName=StepCount]
NODE n5: EqualEqual [B=3]
NODE n6: Branch
NODE n7: PrintString [InString="Sequence Complete"]
NODE n8: GetActorLocation
NODE n9: PlaySoundAtLocation [Sound=CompleteSound]
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.A [Int]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Int]
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute
DATA n4.Value -> n5.A [Int]
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n6.True -> n7.Execute
EXEC n7.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n8.ReturnValue -> n9.Location [Vector]

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint that on BeginPlay creates WBP_Loading widget and adds to viewport. Waits 3 seconds. Removes loading widget. Creates WBP_MainMenu and adds to viewport. Prints Ready.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_LoadScreen
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: CreateWidget [WidgetClass=WBP_Loading]
NODE n3: AddToViewport
NODE n4: Delay [Duration=3.0]
NODE n5: RemoveFromParent
NODE n6: CreateWidget [WidgetClass=WBP_MainMenu]
NODE n7: AddToViewport
NODE n8: PrintString [InString="Ready"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Target [Widget]
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
EXEC n4.Completed -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n5.Target [Widget]
EXEC n5.Then -> n6.Execute
EXEC n6.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.Target [Widget]
EXEC n7.Then -> n8.Execute

prompts.instruction: Create a Blueprint with int Score at 0 and float Health at 100. On BeginPlay create WBP_HUD. On overlap add 10 to Score and print it. On AnyDamage subtract damage from Health. If Health below 0, remove HUD, print Game Over, destroy actor.
prompts.expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_GameLoop
PARENT: Actor
VAR Score: Int = 0
VAR Health: Float = 100.0
VAR HUD: Widget = None
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: CreateWidget [WidgetClass=WBP_HUD]
NODE n3: AddToViewport
NODE n4: VariableSet [VarName=HUD]
NODE n5: Event_ActorBeginOverlap
NODE n6: VariableGet [VarName=Score]
NODE n7: AddInt [B=10]
NODE n8: VariableSet [VarName=Score]
NODE n9: PrintString
NODE n10: Event_AnyDamage
NODE n11: VariableGet [VarName=Health]
NODE n12: SubtractFloat
NODE n13: VariableSet [VarName=Health]
NODE n14: LessThan [B=0.0]
NODE n15: Branch
NODE n16: VariableGet [VarName=HUD]
NODE n17: RemoveFromParent
NODE n18: PrintString [InString="Game Over"]
NODE n19: DestroyActor
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n3.Target [Widget]
EXEC n3.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.ReturnValue -> n4.Value [Widget]
EXEC n5.Then -> n8.Execute
DATA n6.Value -> n7.A [Int]
DATA n7.ReturnValue -> n8.Value [Int]
EXEC n8.Then -> n9.Execute
DATA n8.Value -> n9.InString [String]
EXEC n10.Then -> n13.Execute
DATA n11.Value -> n12.A [Float]
DATA n10.Damage -> n12.B [Float]
DATA n12.ReturnValue -> n13.Value [Float]
EXEC n13.Then -> n15.Execute
DATA n13.Value -> n14.A [Float]
DATA n14.ReturnValue -> n15.Condition [Bool]
EXEC n15.True -> n17.Execute
DATA n16.Value -> n17.Target [Widget]
EXEC n17.Then -> n18.Execute
EXEC n18.Then -> n19.Execute
